translated: The Guide
The Chapter on the Collections
Homage to that Blessed One, the Worthy One, the Rightly Self-awakened One.
What the world worships,
The protector of the world always pays homage to;
This best of his teachings,
The wise one should understand the meaning of the best of men.
The sutta has twelve factors,

analyzed: tam sabbam byañjanam ca attho ca
translated: All that is the phrasing and the meaning;
That should be understood as both,
What is the meaning and what is the phrasing?
The guide has sixteen modes,
The search for the Dispensation is by five methods;
The eighteen root-terms,
Were pointed out by Mahākaccāyana.
The modes are the investigation of the phrasing,
The meaning of the sutta and the three methods;
Both of these are taken up,
The sutta is said to be according to the sutta.

analyzed: yā ca iva desanā yat ca
translated: And the teaching and what is taught,
Both of these should be understood;

analyzed: tatra ayam ānupubbī  navavidha suttanta pariyeṭṭhī iti
translated: Herein this is the sequence, 🔽The search for the ninefold sutta.
The Chapter on the Collections.
